resources.string: Welcome to the app that sheds some light on who I am. You will also be able to add some hobbies which you think I may enjoy.

I\m a passionate Android Developer and lifelong learner from sunny Durban South Africa. I\'m currently completing my Bachelors Degree in Information Technology. I enjoy working in a team and problem solving.
When I\'m not working on cool Apps, I enjoy the outdoors, spending time with family and sports.
Java is a Jack Russel rescue that we got in 2020. When he is not napping, he enjoys laying outside soaking up the sun or walks on the beach.
Floki, is a Jack Russel resuce that I also got in 2020. When he is not taking naps, he enjoys chasing anything that moves or playing with his ball all day.
